1.title: Clara A. Swain, M.D.
1.description: This is a brief biography of Clara A. Swain, M.D. who is regarded as the "first Medical Missionary to the Women of the Orient."  She graduated from the Woman's Medical College in Philadelphia and was sent out to India where she eventually came to be in the service of royalty. - Summary by Larry Wilson

sections.title: Clara A. Swain, M.D. to The Nawab's Gift
First Furlough. to The Last Year of Her Life
